name: evanp-http-proxy
description: Simple HTTP proxy using env variables for config

scripts.docker: docker build -t evanp/http-proxy:${npm_package_version} . && docker tag evanp/http-proxy:${npm_package_version} evanp/http-proxy:latest
scripts.push: docker push evanp/http-proxy:${npm_package_version} && docker push evanp/http-proxy:latest
